programme.title: Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, a woman accepts a temporary job as governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful European family.

programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: Sugarplummed
programme.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfill it.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia accidentally comes away with the visiting pope's ring, then refuses to return it.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia seeks a swinging senior through the personals column; Rose can't recall an old beau who comes to visit her.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A teacher breathes life into Dorothy's decades-old crush on him; Rose makes her debut as a TV producer.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia accidentally comes away with the visiting pope's ring, then refuses to return it.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia seeks a swinging senior through the personals column; Rose can't recall an old beau who comes to visit her.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A teacher breathes life into Dorothy's decades-old crush on him; Rose makes her debut as a TV producer.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier's agent, Bebe (Harriet Sansom Harris), steps in when Roz makes a move for her own radio program.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier takes charge of the station's anniversary program but finds the performance takes charge of itself.

programme.title: A Bride for Christmas
programme.desc: Aiden (Andrew Walker) bets his friends that he can convince a woman to marry him by Christmas, and he sets his sights on Jessie (Arielle Kebbel), a young woman who has sworn off serious relationships.

programme.title: A Dickens of a Holiday!
programme.desc: To mark the 100th anniversary of a Victorian festival, Cassie invites movie star and former high school classmate Jake to play Scrooge in "A Christmas Carol.".

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Told she would have less than a few months to live without a new liver, Heather's time was running out when a kind stranger heard of her plight and discovered he was a perfect match. The two met and before long a friendship developed into romance.

programme.title: Leah's Perfect Gift
programme.desc: A Jewish Leah accompanies her boyfriend to Connecticut to experience a traditional Christmas with his family.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: 'Twas the Date Before Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling the pressure to bring someone home for Christmas, Jessie convinces Bryan to join her family for a day filled with holiday events, only the family doesn't know it's their first date.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Lily's Destiny
programme.desc: With holiday responsibilities piling up, gift-wrapping shop owner Lily eagerly accepts a date with a handsome local realtor. But will he be the one that sweeps her off her feet? Stars Ashley Newbrough, Torrance Coombs.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Tina's Miracle
programme.desc: Successful gift-wrapping shop owner Tina is in charge of planning this year's annual Christmas gala. But things begin to go awry when the gala faces cancellation due to a scrooge-like estate owner.

programme.title: A '90s Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic lawyer destined to spend Christmas alone is transported back to 1999 after an unexpected run in with a particularly wise ride-share driver.

programme.title: An Unexpected Christmas
programme.desc: A speech writer makes a deal with his ex-girlfriend to pretend they are a couple to save his family's Christmas. It's not long before both the ruse and their feelings catch up with them.

programme.title: The Holiday Sitter
programme.desc: Sam is a workaholic bachelor who's babysitting his niece and nephew during the holidays. Completely out of his element, he recruits help from a handsome neighbor and soon finds himself in an unexpected romance.

programme.title: A Dog Named Christmas
programme.desc: A mentally challenged man (Noel Fisher) embarks on a mission to find homes for dogs during the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas Everlasting
programme.desc: Christmas is fast approaching and years of long workdays are about to pay off for Lucy. However, when her older sister unexpectedly passes away, Lucy dreads returning to Nilson's Bay to handle her sister's estate.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A photographer returns home to take care of her grandmother and gets involved with helping a neighbor look after his young nephew.

programme.title: Christmas Waltz
programme.desc: A woman makes an unexpected connection with her dance instructor after her storybook Christmas wedding is canceled.

programme.title: Christmas on Call
programme.desc: The lives of First Responders in Philadelphia intersect over the holiday season while juggling work, personal lives and their dedication to protect and serve their city.

programme.title: A Biltmore Christmas
programme.desc: A magical hourglass sends modern-day screenwriter Lucy Hardgrove to the set of the 1947 holiday movie classic "His Merry Wife!" However, before she can return to the present, Lucy must make things right or threaten to alter the future forever.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Lily's Destiny
programme.desc: With holiday responsibilities piling up, gift-wrapping shop owner Lily eagerly accepts a date with a handsome local realtor. But will he be the one that sweeps her off her feet? Stars Ashley Newbrough, Torrance Coombs.

programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: Linda brings home her younger boyfriend Evan for the holidays, to her family and ex-husband Robert's surprise; Robert and Evan may have more in common than not.
